page.title: 18CHILDS VEIW OF CHADDESLEY
page.content: In the village there is a church called St. Cassian's. The church is used for a family service on Sunday morning and on Friday night for the people who sing in the choir to practice. There is a school called Chaddesley Corbett Endowed First School where I go. There is a market garden where strawberries, raspberries and all things like that are grown and it is called Chaddesley Growers (Needham's). There is a cricket ground which is called Twilight Cricket Club and there I have a good time. There is also a local shop which sells sweets, chocolate, ice lollies, things out of the fridge and bread. The shop is called Jukes Bakery Stores. There is a Butcher's shop and a Hairdressers. There is also an antique shop, quite a few things in Chaddesley are old.
